channel.title: So lets talk about how pointless Runescape is,
channel.description:
All the updates that Runescape has now, are pointless. They have completely destroyed the game entirely, and not only that, but the worst thing is that kids actual play for like 24 hours straight.
Runescape is SO pointless that it actually takes over your [b][i][u]MIND[/u][/i][/b]. The barrows update is pointless. The grand exchange update, was indeed POINTLESS. And the newly updated graphics and landscaping is also POINTLESS. Pretty much, everything about Runescape is pointless now.
All you [b][i][u]mad people [/u][/i][/b]can stay off my post too. Please.

i love to play a dumbed down version of WoW!

item.title: So lets talk about how pointless Runescape is,
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:116, topic:429013”]Dang all this rage to 6 pages…

You should have kept the thoughts to yourself, this thread has become pointless and foolishness.

If you don’t want to play the game now don’t but you don’t need to post it here. And start a rage that’s complete non-sense. The game was made for entertainment and fun. In addition, you say your “18” no offensive but you have a mind of a 5 year old child by the way you act. A person who is 18 would just quit the game and move on to something else without posting a dumb topic of how he hates it.

-End of story[/quote]
that post is pointless.

Read full topic
